tool.name: Plot coverage
tool.description: as area plot between BAM files
tool.command: #import re #set identifier1 = re.sub('[^\w\-_\.\,]', '_', str( $input1.element_identifier)) #set identifier2 = re.sub('[^\w\-_\.\,]', '_', str( $input2.element_identifier)) plot_coverage '$input1' '$identifier1' '$input2' '$identifier2' output.pdf --cores \${GALAXY_SLOTS:-4} --regions '$regions'

param.name: input1
param.label: Select a BAM file to plot

param.name: input2
param.label: Select a second BAM file to plot

param.name: regions
param.label: Select regions to plot
param.help: e.g X:1200000-1250000,X1250000-1300000. If left blank will plot all contigs/chromosomes.

tool.help: This tool plots the coverage over a specified region (by default all chromosomes/contigs).
